panels.title: Response Size in Bytes over Time

targets.expr: (sum(rate(coredns_cache_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", server=~"$server", zone=~"$zone"}[$interval])) - sum(rate(coredns_cache_hits_total{instance=~"$instance", server=~"$server", type="success", zone=~"$zone"}[$interval]))) / sum(rate(coredns_cache_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", server=~"$server", zone=~"$zone"}[$interval]))
